name: Jutland Calling
description:
Sweet, round, and aromatic, this 3-ingredient cocktail is an ideal post-dinner sipper.  
Lachlan Mackenzie from Pourhouse in Vancouver, British Columbia calls for Bornholmer Bitter in this recipe, but you can substitute with The Bitter Truth's Old Time Aromatic Bitters to provide the characteristic cinnamon and cardamon flavors of this drink.

recipeInstructions.text: Combine all ingredients in a mixing glass filled with ice. Stir for 15 seconds and strain into a chilled cocktail glass. Serve straight up.
